title: Don‚Äôt Lose Focus When You Wrap!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Phew! Now, all we have to do is wait for them to cool, Riko-senpai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yup. We sure made a lot. I wonder if all of them will fit in the fridge......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>We‚Äôll have to empty out the fridge......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Should we eat this pudding?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let‚Äôs eat it~! Kasumin needs to replenish her sugar levels after all that hard work!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hehe, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Once the chocolates have hardened, we can wrap them up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The boxes and ribbon you chose are super cute, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ahem! Trusting Kasumin‚Äôs sense of style is the right thing to do, Riko-senpai~! Let‚Äôs keep working hard and wrap up all those chocolates!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Alright! I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing how everyone is going to react~ ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
